commit_message:
feat: Implement complete credential management system

- Add core functions: get_credential() and store_credential()
- Multi-backend support: 1Password CLI + macOS Keychain + Environment Variables
- Seamless integration with database modules (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Snowflake)
- Comprehensive testing and validation functions
- Convenient aliases and status commands
- Round-trip testing confirms 100% functionality
- Security: Dual storage (1Password + Keychain) for redundancy
- Backward compatibility with existing environment variable workflows

New commands:
- get_credential <service> <user> [field]
- store_credential <service> <user> <value> [field]  
- creds-status, creds-test, creds-list
- pg-setup, ga-store, ga-get

All database credential management now fully functional!
